text: Love in Tawang (অসমীয়া:লভ্ ইন টাৱাং) is an Assamese language romantic film directed by Dipak Nath under the banner of Siddhartha Telefilms. Dhruv and Spainee in lead role. This film's songs are composed by Abhijit Barman. ==Cast== * Dhruv * Spainee ==Soundtrack== This film's soundtrack was composed by Abhijit Barman. Category:Indian films Category:2010s Assamese-language films
title: Love in Tawang
